I've been trying to change things since I joined, but
the problem is everyone thinks I'm an idiot and won't
give me half a chance, or even consider my ideas.

--- Legendarynemasis@... wrote:
> Well... the quiet council with a druge against a
> good deal of the RPG speaks. 
> Regardless the idea in essence makes no sense, as it
> would mess with the 
> known continuity. And as for another idea, I am
> currently working on one with 
> Rauq.  Another thing this RPG needs is some good
> strict rules and someone to 
> enforce them. Say I was just joining, seeing someone
> fire 40 shots and 
> someone dodge them really turns me off and think the
>  RPG is a waste of my 
> time because just from those posts I believe most of
> the people have to be 
> moding. thats on example but I know things are
> trying to be changed by rauq 
> and azure.
